item.title: Heavy rigid body with a gyroscope in $\mathbb R^n$
item.description: arXiv:2601.03965v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Starting from the following multidimensional integrable generalizations of the heavy rigid body systems: the Euler top, the Lagrange top, the Lagrange bitop, and the totally symmetric case, we add to each of them a gyroscope. For each of the newly constructed systems, we provide a polynomial matrix Lax representation and prove Liouville integrability. We also present Zhukovskiy's geometric representation of motion of the Euler top with a gyroscope.
item.dc:creator: Vladimir Dragovic, Borislav Gajic, Bozidar Jovanovic
